website_summaries.verdict: Loads of convenient options, from an infant sleeper to heavy-duty changing pad, make this a top pick that's useful from newborn to toddler.
pros: Grows with your child from newborn to toddler
Newborn sleeper keeps bright lights off your baby
Onboard shelving provides quick access to essentials
Changing pad holds babies up to 30 pounds
cons: Napping station could be more supportive

customer_reviews.title: Convenient to have
customer_reviews.text: Product is very convenient to have for your bedroom for late night changes or placing baby to sleep in newborn napper. Storage is great on bottom so you don’t have diapers and wipes everywhere. Also the compartment below there ya nice to put changes of clothes so you have everything within reach when needed. I found on amazon prime day at an amazing price which made this product even better for me. Colors are gender neutral which is nice for reusing you
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Marketing Fraud - “Pack” N Play
customer_reviews.text: No consumer could “pack” this in a reasonable amount of time. No consumer photos will show this “packed” for that reason. Graco has committed fraud in the free market by lying about what they are selling. Challenge: properly “pack” in under 15 minutes. 46 page assembly instructions not included. “Pull red loop before locking rails.” would be easier than 2 pages of bull. Whoever wrote the assembly instructions didn’t think much about it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Hibbard

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, comfortable for my baby boy! Convenient storage as well!
customer_reviews.text: Was a little hesitant to spend this much on a play area, but I’m so glad I did! My baby loves the napper and sleeps at ease with the sounds and vibration. I got it mainly for the storage underneath. The cubbies are smaller than I anticipated because they don’t go all the way back, but it’s perfect for storing diapers, wipes, & my baby’s blankets. I love that in a few months I’ll be able to take off the small napper and use it as a playpen. Also don’t be discouraged by the reviews saying it’s difficult to put together. My baby daddy put it together in 15 minutes without the directions LOL
customer_reviews.author: Treydan’s Mommy ♥️

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: This is used daily at our house! We have it set up in our living room Our baby is currently 6 weeks old and I use the changing table section all of the time (saves me a trip upstairs to use the actual changing table we have in the nursery). Also, the newborn napping bed is another awesome feature at this age. It does take a few minutes to get everything set up/taken down when you include the napping bed and changing table. It is not something you want to assemble every day! It is, however, a baby item you will get your money's worth as it is made to grow with your kiddo. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: ARotz

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely my favorite thing that I bought/received for my baby
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely my favorite thing that I bought/received for my baby! The diaper changer is a little low for complete comfort for me (I'm 5'5), but it doesn't bother me too much. I love the drawers on the bottom when you are using the upper bed. The bassinet addition is soft and well made, but it doesn't hang like I expected. It just sits down in the crib bed (I think I got this mixed up with another pack n play I was looking at). Over all, this is a well built pack in play with some great extra features at a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Breeden

customer_reviews.title: Shipped incorrect product
customer_reviews.text: Baby is due this week so we need the product ASAP. They shipped the incorrect product. We do not have time to return and wait on the new one. The product looks nice, material and quality good. Only reason I am giving a 2 star is the wrong product. Additionally, it does not have as large storage as the manor. They shipped us the McKinley. It also does not have the night light feature we were looking forward to. At this point, we have to settle. Oh and we foun the Manor for $135 on Graco website so be sure to use their site. Not pay $100 more for the wrong product.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Davis

customer_reviews.title: convenient.
customer_reviews.text: purchased this mostly for the zip bottom. in the past, i've always hated storing baby's extra diapers or clothes in the bottom and if i wanted them, i would need to take the top off to get to them. with this, i can easily store those extra things and have easy access to them without disturbing baby on top. this was very easy to put together. gave this four stars because the music device did not function at all.
customer_reviews.author: shai

customer_reviews.title: The product has a manufacturing defect
customer_reviews.text: This product has a faulty design with the mat. They dont align flat. I called the costumer care for help. They said they will send me the replacement a month ago and then they asked about changing the model as a replacement and they are saying dont use the product with out any real help. Graco customer service is pathetic in my opinion. I have attached images of the faulty mat they provide.
customer_reviews.author: Madhan T

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t all fit in the bag
customer_reviews.text: I’m so sad that this playard doesn’t fit in the travel bag. It has nice accessories and sets up nice. I’m just sad that I can’t fit it all in the travel bag to travel and/or store the playard.
customer_reviews.author: B. Robison

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and poorly engineered
customer_reviews.text: One of the worst products we've ever purchased. The build quality is absolutely terrible - the top poorly attaches to the unit via cheap plastic hooks that fall off at the drop of a bucket. The bassinet attaches via metal nubs that require loss of a fingernail to attach, let alone remove. Regret x100
customer_reviews.author: Matt Roper

customer_reviews.title: should have researched more before purchase...
customer_reviews.text: I love and hate this pack and play. I love the changer, crib, and shelving unit. I HATE the napper. It’s not safe for an infant to sleep while the parents sleep as well. Huge SIDS risk. If it was easy to remove, I’d be happier, but it’s a real pain to try to get in and out. I have no use for the napper and I don’t think any parent who wants to use this pack and play as a overnight sleep area will. I wish I would have bought a pack n play with a flat bassinet instead of this one. Total regret.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I thought the Napier / carrier looking, bassinet thing would be able to go room to room without the playpen. This is not the case. The diaper changing pad cardboard thing does not flip up either. Felt a little cheap to Mel. The actual playpen seemed ok and the unzip area with makeshift shelves was ok.
customer_reviews.author: Unique1

customer_reviews.title: Two baby thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: Really couldn't ask for anything better. The light, the vibration, and the sounds are all nifty features for the bassinet . This thing is pretty customizable and really feels like something we can use for years and years to come. I ordered from Amazon Warehouse, and the packaging was absolutely beat to heck, with parts sticking out of the box, but it was all ok. My only wish is that it were about 2" narrower so I could fit it through my bedroom door without having to take it all apart, but that's a fairly minor and highly individual problem. Nice work Graco.
customer_reviews.author: Dayman ah-ahhh-aahhhhhh Fighter of the Nightman

customer_reviews.title: it also has a great changing table and awesome storage that will come in ...
customer_reviews.text: As someone who lives in a small, one bedroom apartment, I knew that I needed baby furniture that was compact and also served multiple purposes. Not only can my baby sleep and nap in this pack 'n play, it also has a great changing table and awesome storage that will come in handy due to lack of space. It came in great condition, no tears, all the pieces and the fabric in the napper felt really soft. I'm very impressed with it and excited for baby to get here to put it to use.
customer_reviews.author: Keyvan

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my 4th baby because I knew she would be staying in our room longer since she'd be eventually sharing a room with her sibling. The idea of the newborn napper is nice but we didn't use it long (she is 3 weeks old). The changer hasn't been used but with a 4th baby you change them wherever you are - usually the floor. The storage is really nice for diapers and wipes! Buy it!
customer_reviews.author: CousinsPartyOf6

customer_reviews.title: Bells & whistles
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used one of these in 16 years and the changes and additions made to this are just everything. From the storage, to bassinet to changing table & vibration chair. Graco thought of everything for this deluxe version! Totally worth every penny and it's easy to assemble, take apart and (re) move additional pieces. Looking forward to using this with our newborn
customer_reviews.author: Fran

customer_reviews.title: Extra storage is awesome. Didn't try putting baby to sleep in it ...
customer_reviews.text: Extra storage is awesome. Didn't try putting baby to sleep in it yet. The bassinet was nice,, but too small for my 22 inch baby. The changing station. It is better then nothing, but I still didn't figure it out to be completely comfortable. But it serves so far what it was bought for - second story option, in addition to the main nursery. Would be much better, if I could just flip the changing storage away, without completely removing. Though it is easy to remove it, still annoying. Why can't they take their products and combine all good features together in one???
customer_reviews.author: Marina

customer_reviews.title: Hard to assemble
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is ok but the most pathetic thing is the instruction manual. Seems like the person who has written it was assuming half of the things in his/her mind. We were not able to follow things step by step instead we were supposed to think by ourselves while assuming it. Finally, we searched for somebody assembling this online and were able to do this. We are in full mode of setting up the nursery but setting this bad boy up took a toll on my husabnd. We have not yet started using this will find out more.
customer_reviews.author: Hina Singh

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The box came rreally beat up but I had high hopes, the assembly wouldn't be bad if we had every part, we had at least 2 missing parts. Also the bassinets is installed odd, I was hoping it was an easy click on and off but you have to slip the pipe on and off a tube which is a hassle and unsafe if you wanna move the baby bc you have to literally disassemble the bassinet if you wanna get it out. I'm really disappointed, sending it back and ordering from the actual Graco website.
customer_reviews.author: is1ander

customer_reviews.title: Very soft.
customer_reviews.text: I ended up returning only because I found a better deal at our local store. It’s a wonderful product. I bought the exact same one and I’m highly satisfied with my choice. I got my money back in a timely fashion. I had no issues with the one from amazon, except the price.
customer_reviews.author: Julius

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to Assemble extra parts, but great product!
customer_reviews.text: This Pack 'n Play was great for my son, especially as a newborn infant. We were able to keep this in our room, and use the extra storage to house diapers, wipes, and extra clothes. The sound machine and easy-access height was just what we need as new parents to endure the long nights. We could take my son from the bed to the diaper changing station quickly. I highly recommend. The only difficult part was putting the bassinet together, make sure you have the pieces going the correct way! The directions are a little difficult to read.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great but...
customer_reviews.text: love everything about it (easy to install, ability to clean the changing station, organization area) EXCEPT for the fact that the napping station really can't be cleaned. kinda gross. won't be using that portion of the playard. otherwise, great for the money.
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it so when my grandchildren sleep over - it was difficult to put together but once completed - it was beautiful and very happy with the quality - will come in very handy for years to come. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Marilou Urzo

customer_reviews.title: Easy Assembly, Seems Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: It only took me 30 minutes to put together by myself, my husband was a little disappointed I didn't need his help! It seems sturdy and I love the storage. Baby is still 6 days away from entering the world so I'm not sure if we'll use the napper or just the bassinet at first. I was disappointed that I put it together in our living room only to find out it wouldn't fit through a standard doorway but it was easy to partially break down and reassemble.
customer_reviews.author: Desiree M

customer_reviews.title: Bassinet doesnt strap on
customer_reviews.text: It works great good size very sturdy just the bassinet doesn't strap in like the picture shows the bassinet and the changing table sitting on top the changing table snaps on the top but the bassinet doesn't for some reason??
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Good pack and play for the money
customer_reviews.text: Fairly simple to put together and disassemble. The pack and play has a carry case which is easy and nice but the changing table and napper do not. The napper and changing table are kind of a pain to put together and take apart. Other than that its good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Assembly Moderately Easy
customer_reviews.text: Most assembly was simple, but there was a little trouble. The instruction would be better if it guided you to a YouTube video instead of small printed version. I did look at YouTube, but you some can be a little wordy.
customer_reviews.author: ME

customer_reviews.title: The Ferrari of Pack-N-Plays!
customer_reviews.text: Was purchased as a gift and she loves it! The baby loves it! Everybody loves it! Dont mess around w/other brands, just buy it. Do it right the first time!
customer_reviews.author: Pasta Lover

customer_reviews.title: A must for the nursery
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, more than what we expected. Colors are bright (but not too bright), does not take up too much space in the nursery...just the right size. All the extras are convenient and placed in the right spots.
customer_reviews.author: B. Ester

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use convenient and safe
customer_reviews.text: We love this product it’s firm and sturdy. It’s also perfect for our small room where baby is right next to our bed and it doesn’t take a lot of space from us. Its also so easy to pick the baby up without getting out of bed. We love the changing table where you can just roll over and change your baby without any hustle❤️ Thanks so much Graco So far so good
customer_reviews.author: Farhiya Ali

customer_reviews.title: The spring loaded hole and nub to attach the newborn napper and changing station are easy to assemble but very difficult to take
customer_reviews.text: Bought this fir or new granddaughter got when they visit. Directions for assembly were mediocre. Watched a you tube video after which setup took about a half hour. The spring loaded hole and nub to attach the newborn napper and changing station are easy to assemble but very difficult to take apart. Despite this I still have five stars as the quality and functionality are excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Not for the weak
customer_reviews.text: Wish it was a little more detailed on assembling the smaller attachment pieces. Thank god im Ikeas #1 builder. The rigorous hours of sweat and tears it took to be this certified has finally paid off. You’re welcome.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine enriquez

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for NB.
customer_reviews.text: This by far has been a great purchase. It took the hubby and I about 1.5 hours to put together. We haven’t used it yet since our baby boy isn’t due until Feb. once we try it with the features, we’ll update the review. The extra storage at the bottom is a bonus. So far we stored diapers there.
customer_reviews.author: Jessika H

customer_reviews.title: Ready for my little man
customer_reviews.text: I’m due in two weeks and was able to set this up. YouTube directions. I bought mine with box damaged for 143$ instead of 229$ and I’m so happy I did!!
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Love the storage!
customer_reviews.text: Adorable and perfect for baby to sleep and have an area to change him! It was a little difficult for me to assemble, but my husband was able to snap the pieces together easily. Love the color and storage!
customer_reviews.author: Mississippi Mama

customer_reviews.title: good product for babies who are not picky
customer_reviews.text: Overall, good product for babies who are not picky. The newborn napping station only last about a month before my son needed to move to the bassinet. The bassinet is pretty firm and not comfortable. My son will only sleep in it when we layer a few soft plush blankets (which is frowned upon). The changing table slopes downward so it was hard to change him in the beginning, we needed to add additional support. On the plus side, I love the bottom shelves for additional storage.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Encina

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Gift!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift. This wasn't the exact pack n' play that was on their register, but had so many additional options that I would have loved to had when my kids were young. They LOVED it!!! They've told me at least 3 separate times how much they love the extra storage space, the changing table and the vibrating cradle seat. Thank you Graco & Amazon for helping me maintain my "Excellent Gift Giver" status!!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Knaus

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product! Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I love this pack and play! The changing table is sturdy, the napper is soft and cozy. I love the vibration that can move throughout the system where it's needed. I love the sound choices and the night light. I plan on using this until my son is around a year old. It's perfect for different stages. I did order a pack and play mattress for the bottom when he is sitting up and needs to move down from the bassinet.
customer_reviews.author: Kaysie Monroe

customer_reviews.title: Received it fast
customer_reviews.text: This is not the easiest to put together but it got done. Purchased this for emergencies Incase I need to bring my child with me at work.
customer_reviews.author: Donna C.

customer_reviews.title: Great.
customer_reviews.text: Came together perfectly. Wish the instructions made better sense but that’s not amazons fault!
customer_reviews.author: Bonnye Ellertson

customer_reviews.title: too many bells and whistles
customer_reviews.text: we got this as a shower gift and i thought it would be super useful but it seems like it's trying to do too many things at once. a simple playard is really all you need.
customer_reviews.author: thegirlwhoruns

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE
customer_reviews.text: Never been so happy with a purchase! Took me about an hour or so to assemble but the finished product was well worth the price! I am ABSOLUTELY IN LOVE with this Pac'nPlay and highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Sierra McDole

customer_reviews.title: We love it now, does come with some assembly frustrations
customer_reviews.text: *Directions are of the bottom of the pack and play! Took about 30 minutes for my husband and I to put together at 6 Months pregnant. It comes with a sound soother for baby, maybe I missed it when reading about this product but it was a pleasant suprise. We live in a tiny house so I love the storage compartment underneath. Perfect for us just starting out. Everything is together in one spot so it's perfect for us to use as he grows.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie N Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great item and AMAZING customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I had an issue with the sound machine and Kishor from Graco sent another one overnight to us! WOW! First class product with First class customer service, another Graco product did the trick for us! Easey to set up, our newborn loves the bassinet.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Davis

customer_reviews.title: As described.
customer_reviews.text: Came in perfect condition. Easy to use. And super pretty. We love the bassinet and changing table!
customer_reviews.author: Chi

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Got it for a big discount
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Got it for a big discount. For now, we mostly just use it as a changing table with our newborn while downstairs. Storage spots are nice. Instructions weren't the best, but manageable. Mostly use the sleeper as a shelf right now though.
customer_reviews.author: Gigner

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for when my granddaughter visits. Bed, changing table that my wife can use. Very sturdy. Caution cats love it as a bed also.
customer_reviews.author: goose

customer_reviews.title: Great Item
customer_reviews.text: brought as a gift for my god daughter, she loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Love the under storage compartment
customer_reviews.text: Love the under storage compartment, such a smart use of empty space! Did not find much point in the napper seat, I was under the impression that it comes on and off like a bouncy seat and can be moved around the house, but NOT on this one
customer_reviews.author: DF

customer_reviews.title: Worth every Penny!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd Pack N Play that I have bought! I first got one for my Daughter 16 yrs ago, and it held up for both her kids, and she has loaned it out many times, and it still held up! I gave 2 more as Shower Gifts and both love them! I wish they had these back in the day when I had my Daughter.. had to lug a big ole Playpen around!
customer_reviews.author: Anita S.

customer_reviews.title: Baby registry
customer_reviews.text: This is a gift for my daughter-in-law. She has not opened yet but I have heard good reviews about this.
customer_reviews.author: Annemarie

customer_reviews.title: Everything you need in one spot!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this!!! It has storage for diapers and wipes. I also have the babies bathing items stored too. Easy clean charging table that allows you to stand in front instead of on the side while changing baby. My baby is only 2 months so haven't used as a play pen yet but sure it will work perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: LaToya Linder

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Instructions are not clear at all. We had to seek instruction on line. It took a bit over 2 hours😫to assemble. Not sure if I want to close it.
customer_reviews.author: Annette

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this pack n play! Love that it has a bassinet and changing table. We decided to put this in our bedroom so that our baby is nearby! I love that it plays music as well has a vibration feature that helped put my little one to sleep! Would highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: I love how I can sit up and check on her
customer_reviews.text: I have a 2 week old baby girl and I have this set up next to my bed. I love how I can sit up and check on her, feed and change her without having to get up. She loves the vibration feature in the bed and I love the light it has on it. Plus the sleeper can be tossed into the washer which has come in very handy!
customer_reviews.author: Kae Zupan

customer_reviews.title: Not satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Sad, I looked around for the perfect play pen with a bassinet and changing station. Was disappointed with the bassinet on this. I will not allow my newborn to sleep on the bassinet, it’s not sturdy enough and the shade top part doesn’t stay up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect. Anybody with a Graco pack-n-play knows that these ...
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect. Anybody with a Graco pack-n-play knows that these are great. We have this set up at the nana's house in place of a crib, a bassinet, and a changing table. Wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Quality Tested Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Vibration doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: the Vibration part of this worked for about 3 weeks and quit. we put new batteries in it to see if that was the problem. but it didn't help.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome gift!!!
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift for new parents and they couldn't be happier. Works great to transition from newborn on. Allows the new parents to have everything in one place with easy access.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne Livingston-Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Life savet
customer_reviews.text: Life saver i use this in my bedroom for my newborn till shes big enough for her nursery
customer_reviews.author: Kandis

customer_reviews.title: Its ok
customer_reviews.text: It's an ok pack and play for the price. Upon setting up the newborn seat, both pins got stuck inside the bar and I havent been able to get them out.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Fortner

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a 2 story house!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my niece for a shower gift. She loved it! Looking forward to using it downstairs so she doesn't have to always go upstairs!
customer_reviews.author: Lori H.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Really beautiful. Works well with dream on me mattress 3". Storage compartments are helpful and was easy to put together however it does not fit through doorways so prepare it in the room you want it in.
customer_reviews.author: carlee

customer_reviews.title: The pack N play is amazing and so pretty
customer_reviews.text: The pack N play is amazing and so pretty!!! However it is SO HARD to put the changing table part together.... My husband actually had to bend the metal to get it to connect😁 It ended up working out but we will NEVER take it apart😂 I overall am very very happy with it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Peggy

customer_reviews.title: I loved the built in storage
customer_reviews.text: Such a space saver! I loved the built in storage,diaper changer and vibrating bassinet and the price was a a great deal!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley teresa

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this 3 years ago and used it for my son for the first year. I now use it for my daughter and it's as good as it was the day I bought it!!
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful wish I had, had this one!
customer_reviews.text: Got it used but I don't think it ever actually used. Clean, nice and perfect. My sister in law loves it! The changing table and all the storage are perfect for her. They have their crib upstairs but keep this downstairs to avoid all the back and forth.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Gudmunsen

customer_reviews.title: Graco Pack 'n Play
customer_reviews.text: I love this product on the storage, and how this will grow with the baby! You won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: ... the changing table nor the other area but I love it. Baby is 10mths still uses it for ...
customer_reviews.text: Never used the changing table nor the other area but I love it. Baby is 10mths still uses it for his naps. The storage area was great too bad it was not built to last; as baby got bigger we dropped it lower losing the storage.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: I love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this thing! I am using it in my living area as a true newborn napper/changing station and it's just perfect! its great that it will grow with her as her well. Totally worth it! Easier than a lot of that I tried to put up and down as well.
customer_reviews.author: EMANON

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but frustrating assembly.
customer_reviews.text: Frustrating instructions for assembly, and it's not all that easy to put up. The instructions only made sense in retrospect, ie. "Oh, that's what they meant". I put this together for the first time after assembling an ikea nightstand, which was considerably quicker and easier out of the box. Also, once you disassemble it doesn't pack up as conveniently as I'd hoped if you want to bring the changing table and the bassinet with it. The quality is good, and once set up seems very functional but I'm just not as excited about traveling around with this.
customer_reviews.author: Garth Walker

customer_reviews.title: Great combo
customer_reviews.text: Love the storage area, and the changer was a lifesaver until my baby outgrew it. We didn't use the sleeper too much, but it helped on those nights we had to put the baby in the bed with us to get some sleep. I have no complaints about this pack N play, its great!
customer_reviews.author: Kerri Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great for small spaces.
customer_reviews.text: The mattress insert is a little hard, which my son dislikes a little. But we just laid a thicker blanket down under him for cushioning. Love the storage space atm too. We never used the bassinet or change table.
customer_reviews.author: Allandra Farris

customer_reviews.title: Love the shelves
customer_reviews.text: Love the shelves. Once your baby is older, you can unzip the flap, and they have fun crawling in and out like a little fort!
customer_reviews.author: LBZ

customer_reviews.title: Other than that I love it!
customer_reviews.text: The changing table does sit flat so she rolls slightly to the right with I change her. Tried to straighten it but nothing works. Other than that I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha H

customer_reviews.title: Love the attachments on this
customer_reviews.text: Love the attachments on this, we even used just the bassinet feature to lay on our bed and inside the pack n play since our baby doesn't like it hanging. I love the storage feature for keeping burp rags, blankets, and clothes close by and out of the way.
customer_reviews.author: SWIMNEDAY

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for New Born - They're Loving Them (I Bought 2)
customer_reviews.text: They must be loving them - one for my niece's new born as a gift. One for my daughter's second baby that now she has 2 Pack & Play(s). I assembled one and I thought instructions were below average. It got done, but it took me 2 to 3 hours.
customer_reviews.author: JKK

customer_reviews.title: This thing is awesome!! At first I thought it was going ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome!! At first I thought it was going to be flimsy, but after I set it up I was really surprised at how durable it is! I was also surprised to learn it has a vibrating and music attachment that works with the bassinet crib and sleeper attachment! Very satisfied <3
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Smith

customer_reviews.title: Product is great! Directions leave a little bit to be desired
customer_reviews.text: Product is great! Directions leave a little bit to be desired!
customer_reviews.author: Phil Brickner

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: Must have. We love this. Perfect changing station. Haven't used the crib yet
customer_reviews.author: Eric K.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to fold and bring to our house
customer_reviews.text: For my daughter. She loves the storage below. This is her third, so she knew what she wanted. Has everything needed for this new grandchild from birth to toddler. Easy to fold and bring to our house, too. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: ... third child and it still looks brand new my best friend is going to be a grandmother and I ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one of these Pack & plays for my stepdaughter over four years ago she is now on her third child and it still looks brand new my best friend is going to be a grandmother and I got this for her daughter-in-law she was thrilled with it it's not quite yet but I'm sure it will have a long prosperous life
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks good and fits our needs
customer_reviews.text: Looks good and fits our needs. If you are really looking for something mobile, I would keep looking. It seems like it would be a pain to assemble over and over. Also, read through the entire instruction manual FIRST. The instructions start with setting it up for a toddler and works backwards for some reason.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The product delivery and packaging was perfect. I wasn't too happy with the process of ...
customer_reviews.text: The product delivery and packaging was perfect. I wasn't too happy with the process of putting it together. It is a bit fiddley as opposed to what it advertises itself to be. Also, now I feel It would have been better to buy the pack and play that has storage on the side instead of at the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Disha

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This was an awesome playpen. My son outgrew it quickly, but that's a genetic thing. We got a decent amount of use out of it before he learned to rock it. Also it was super easy to pack up and throw in the trunk
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not real happy
customer_reviews.text: Item itself looks nice easy to set up but my daughter who just had her baby and just started using it went to put the batteries in the musical and vibrating attachment and the insides fell apart
customer_reviews.author: Ruby Campany

customer_reviews.title: Great travel bed for your child
customer_reviews.text: I love this pack-n-play. Everything you need for your infant and toddler's away from home sleep. Solid construction. Easy set up and tear down. Good, long-lasting, well-known brand.
customer_reviews.author: joanies

customer_reviews.title: Can't give review do to not using this for mysrlf.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a baby gift off of Mom to be wish list.
customer_reviews.author: Sharion Rigney

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put together, I'm 8 months pregnant and did it by myself in about 45 mins. There was a little rip in the changing table but everything else is perfect. Can't wait to put my son in it :))
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Dawson

customer_reviews.title: ... this for a baby shower gift and the parents loved it! They live in a small apartment and ...
customer_reviews.text: I gave this for a baby shower gift and the parents loved it! They live in a small apartment and this suited their needs perfectly until they move into their house.
customer_reviews.author: lucaliza

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: It took a little to assemble but all part work together. Storage space is the best when just using the top of the pack and play.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Heath

customer_reviews.title: buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this playpen!!! The vibration feature was amazing. When I laid my kid down, he couldn't wake up even when he tried (light sleeper).
customer_reviews.author: Karmen M. Sasser

customer_reviews.title: Nice but annoying
customer_reviews.text: Great for storage and diaper changes, the only thing I dislike is the napper that comes off is a pain to take on and off so it sits in the closet.
customer_reviews.author: Random Amazoner in Florida

customer_reviews.title: Works great, read all instructions first then assemble
customer_reviews.text: I found it a little more complicated to put the bassinet and changing pieces together.. the instructions didn’t help me much
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: At first i wasn't sure about the sturdyness of the bassinet but once i got it all put together i think it will be just fine!! Ex
customer_reviews.text: I just got this yesterday, but our baby wont be here until Dec. So we havent used it woth the baby yet. This was a pain in the butt to put together, took me over an hour to get it together even having the directions next to me. At first i wasn't sure about the sturdyness of the bassinet but once i got it all put together i think it will be just fine!! Excited to use it when baby gets here!!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. It's sturdy, and it offers a lot of great options for versatile use. My one complaint is that the bassinet is a little tough to get on and off. Moving the poles into the correct position could be a little easier. Still, it's an excellent thing to have!
customer_reviews.author: Drake Varvorines

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Would 10/10 recommend! This is perfect and has all the essentials without spending a ton
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This was a gift, as yet unused - waiting ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift, as yet unused - waiting for the baby! This gift was requested by the soon-to-be parents and very carefully researched so i believe it will qualify for the rating i have given it.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia B. Cox

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sleeper/changer/pac n play
customer_reviews.text: Must have for my little guy. Height is great. Love the extra storage and that it will grow with him. Changing table is a must and the shade on the bassinet is a great plus.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine M

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied grandma!
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with the Graco Pack 'N Playard with newborn napper DLX. We purchased this item so when our daughter and son-in-law visited with their newborn they wouldn't have to worry about bringing theirs. I love the front storage for baby items. You don't have to run somewhere to get extra pj's, outfits, diapers, or whatever else you might need. The diaper changing station is large and convenient also holding babies up to 30 lbs.. My favorite feature was the battery operated white noise and vibrating for the newborn napper XL that help to sooth the baby. Another feature that I appreciated was the neutral color that will work for either boy or girl for future grandchildren. ;-)
customer_reviews.author: girl at heart

product_meta.title: Graco Pack 'n Play Newborn Seat DLX Playard, Manor
product_meta.description:
The Graco Pack 'n Play Newborn Seat DLX Playard DLX grows with your child as you place your newborn in the cozy micro-fleece seat, then as your infant rests in the comfortable full-size bassinet, to your playful toddler safe in the full-size play yard. The Pack 'n Play Newborn Seat DLX Playard offers space-saving convenience with its stylish built-in storage shelves that allow you to keep blankets, diapers, pajamas and other necessities close by.

CARE AND MAINTENANCE
 *  Clean with household soap and warm water/drip dry
   
   
 *  No bleach; Machine wash carry bag in lukewarm water
   
   
 *  If playard gets sandy, carefully remove sand from all surfaces before packing into bag as sand can damage top rail lock
   
   
 *  Machine wash newborn seat separately in cold water, Delicate cycle. No bleach. Drip dry
   
   



BRAND STORY
By Graco
feature_bullets: Newborn Seat station has beautifully-styled, extra-soft micro-fleece fabric that cuddles baby
Stylish, built-in storage shelves create nursery-like convenience right in your living room
Canopy keeps baby shielded from direct light and keeps them soothed any time of day
Changing table is safe for use with babies up to 30 lbs and provides time saving-convenience during diaper changes
Enhanced electronics offer 5 classical songs, 5 soothing nature sounds and 2-speed vibration in both the seat and the bassinet to entertain and soothe your little one

specifications.Care instructions: Clean with household soap and warm water/drip dry ;No bleach; Machine wash carry bag in lukewarm water ;If playard gets sandy, carefully remove sand from all surfaces before packing into bag as sand can damage top rail lock ;Machine wash newborn seat separately in cold water, Delicate cycle. No bleach. Drip dry
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars490 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
